text:
You don’t need a PhD to learn AI. 

These 12 LinkedIn creators make it easy for you:

1. Ruben Hassid: Explains AI in simple, easy steps.
2. Anisha Jain: Shares ways to create content (+AI).
3. Axelle Malek: Explains AI tools in a clear way.
4. Grant Lee: Building Gamma to make AI slides.
5. Kai Feng: Building Blink to make AI apps in secs.
6. Felix Haas: Shares about modern design + AI.
7. Tanay Kothari: Building Wispr, voice-to-text AI.
8. Rowan Cheung: Posts daily news on AI.
9. Rory Flynn: Makes AI fun and easy to get.
10. Lior Alexander: Shows cool AI demos and tools.
11. Noam Nisand: Shares smart ways to sell with AI.
12. Pete Sena: Talks about tech, brand, & startups.

You learned something? 
♻️ Follow How to AI to catch up with AI advancements.
